legacy.full_text: At the welcome dinner by friendly organizations in the U.S., President Xi noted that his first visit to the U.S. in 1985 started from San Francisco, which formed his first impression of this country. Today he still keeps a photo of him in front of the Golden Gate Bridge. https://t.co/R6vpjg9hhA
